ygData.msgSnippet: Unicron was taken aback by feeling Primus. But, as he pondered what Primus had said, he saw through him what was to come. Unicron: Temporal manipulations? My

Unicron was taken aback by feeling Primus. But, as he pondered what 
Primus had said, he saw through him what was to come.

Unicron: Temporal manipulations? My old rival, you do not realize. I 
come not from the future where you lay, but rather I have been here 
all along. Destroy me now and those you call the Decepticons will 
reduce you to a molten ball of flame in a matter of mere centuries.
You will have to refrain from delivering the killing blow, not only 
yours, but that of even those you do not control! Mark my words: I 
fear you not!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> Primus was not amused as he watched through his
> connection with Shadowcaster. Taking control, he sent
> a chillingly stern message through to every spark in
> the vicinity of of the Earth and its satellites.
> 
> "I will warn you once abomination- end your temporal
> sabotage now, or I will eradicate your spark and the
> sparks of all your minions from existence."
> 
> Meanwhile outside the Arkt, giant robotic forms were
> materialising out of thin air. The first to
> materialise was a samurai like figure with a skeletal
> face, his brown and yellow familiar to all those who
> knew their Cybertronain history.  His virtually
> indestructible Neo-titanium sword drawn, his eyes
> meant business. While the thought of working with
> inferior warriors such as Autobots sickened him, he
> knew all too well that Primus' commissioning of him
> was a matter of honor, in edition to the fact that
> Unicron's dishonourable tactics sickened him to the
> core. Bludgeon was reborn- and he meant business.  He
> was shortly followed by an all too familiar Silver and
> Gold T-Rex.  
> 
> The moment after he materialised, he transformed into
> robort mode, Energio Sword drawn and double barrelled
> mortar launcher in hand- Grimlock had returned.  Next
> to materialise was a form new to all- his warrior
> visage looked a mixure of american Indian and Viking,
> his power sword in hand- Magnaboss was born. 
> Following him was a giant, even by Autobot standard,
> his wings and backpack towering over bludgeon and
> Grimlock, as his round head and broad shoulders formed
> before the rest of his solid built robotic body
> materialised, his double barreled particle beam cannon
> at the ready- Skyfire was reborn.  Next to him, the
> technorganic form of a wolf with a a mean look on his
> face srpouting a mean looking cannon appeared-
> Carnivac had joined the fray.   Folloing Carnivac, a
> green and grey moving powerhouse materialised with
> enough firepower to back up any arguement it put
> forward. The tanks transformed to reveal the former
> Autobot Headmaster- Hardhead.  Hardhead was then
> joined by two more comrades- the first a being of
> great courage and one worthy of being called a warrior
> even by Bludgeon's standards. Even though he had been
> physically weak in the past, his fluro green, black
> and gold form now stood as tall as bludgeon, as Primus
> had seen fit to revive his body at its most powerful-
> Bumblebee had returned.
> 
> The final Autobot to appear looked somewhat like a
> samurai in armour- the tall, tower-like shoulders,
> even broader form than his traditional body, coupled
> with his sword of pure energon and double barrelled
> laser cannon, made this Autobot even more
> inspirational and intimidating than he had been in the
> past.  Optimus Prime had returned.
> 
> OOC: the materialising takes place over mere seconds
> 
> BIC: Primus addressed all transformers in the Earth
> sphere once more "Send your minions chaos bringer, but
> beware, just as you have your minions, I have my
> champions. Take note of their sparks abomination- when
> you do, you'll see your minions do not stand a
> chance."
> 
> Primus waited for a reply.
> 
> OOC: In case some people are wondering, I've had
> Primus bring back these transformers in their most
> powerful forms that we saw them in  in the toy line-
> thus Bludgeon has his pretender shell, as does
> carnivac, Bumblebee is a Gobot, Skyfire is in his
> original form as is Grimlock, Magnaboss has been used
> for the autobot/maximal quartet, and Optimus Prime is
> a Laser Rod. 
>  --- Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote: >
> NewHope 2:
> > Where the Bigger Vessel Landed in the ocean. The
> > ocean seemed to Roar to life as a Monument Begun to
> > rise out of the water. The monument to on a Robot
> > form about 200 meter tall. It looks up to the Sky
> > and Answers Unicrons Damands. "I am Dicron. A clone
> > of you yet smaller. I see you as the threat here. If
> > you do not leave this planet then I will be forced
> > to destroy you." At that the Bot Dicron seems to
> > activate its jump jets and takes off towards Land in
> > search of its missing Part SONIC STORM. 
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: Robo, Airly, this is your cue to take a squad
> > and bash some 
> > bolts!
> > 
> > Bic:
> > 
> > Unicron's propulsors came to a step as he settled in
> > the Moon's 
> > orbit. He stood there, watching the energon-bloated
> > jewel that was 
> > Earth. He zoomed his malevolent attention on the
> > three Cybertronian 
> > bases and decided that these were the objectives. A
> > low roar arose 
> > as he began to speak. His voice would be transmitted
> > all over the 
> > planet.
> > 
> > Unicron: I claim this planet as mine. Any
> > Transformer on it will be 
> > destroyed unless they choose to become my servants.
> > Also, if you 
> > part with the Matrix, I may spare your spark.
> > 
> > The Transmission ended abruptly. The Chaos Bringer
> > turned to his 
> > many Minions.
> > 
> > Unicron: We will attack in waves. Kill all you find,
> > unless they 
> > offer their alliegeance. Sky-Eye, find Bloodblade.
> > 
> > The first squad, the Flaming Eye of Morgoth (hint
> > hint!), left on 
> > that instant for Predacon base. They were Firewhip,
> > Klash, 
> > Crumblefish, Sky-Eye and the big Ragebomber. They
> > would be there 
> > soon...
> > 
> > 
> >
